name: Binspy Systems
overview: Binspy Systems is a business solutions company dedicated to helping customers attain complete digital control of their infrastructure. Their Corporate Intelligence Network (CIN) aims to monitor and manage infrastructure in real-time, thus enhancing productivity and cost efficiency within companies. Binspy’s CIN product suite is diverse and can be used for a wide variety of applications making this technology unique in today’s market. The design is highly modularized to permit upgrades and enhance functionality using any technology, ensuring that the system will never become obsolete.

offices.address1: The Exchange Tower, 130 King Street West
